sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He can be heard being tortured for information about the murder of Ser [[Amory Lorch]] as [[Arya Stark]] passes the gallows at [[Harrenhal]].<ref>"[[The Prince of Winterfell]]"</ref>
